接口的使用
org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.ServletContextInitializer

  • 使用ServletContextInitializer的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.jetty
    Embedded reactive and servlet web server implementations backed by Jetty.
    org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.tomcat
    Embedded reactive and servlet web server implementations backed by Tomcat.
    org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.undertow
    Embedded reactive and servlet web server implementations backed by Undertow.
    org.springframework.boot.web.servlet
    Classes and utilities designed to work with the `javax.servlet` specification.
    org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.context
    Servlet based web integrations with Spring's WebApplicationContext.
    org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.server
    Servlet web server abstractions.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Configure the given Jetty WebAppContext for use.
      protected Configuration JettyServletWebServerFactory.getServletContextInitializerConfiguration(WebAppContext webAppContext, ServletContextInitializer... initializers)
      Return a Jetty Configuration that will invoke the specified ServletContextInitializers.
      protected Configuration[] JettyServletWebServerFactory.getWebAppContextConfigurations(WebAppContext webAppContext, ServletContextInitializer... initializers)
      Return the Jetty Configurations that should be applied to the server.
      WebServer JettyServletWebServerFactory.getWebServer(ServletContextInitializer... initializers) 
      参数类型为ServletContextInitializer的org.springframework.boot.web.embedded.jetty中的构造器 
      构造器和说明

      Create a new ServletContextInitializerConfiguration.

      Base class for Servlet 3.0+ based registration beans.

      Utility method that can be used by subclasses wishing to combine the specified ServletContextInitializer parameters with those defined in this instance.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Add ServletContextInitializers to those that should be applied in addition to ServletWebServerFactory.getWebServer(ServletContextInitializer...)

      WebServer ServletWebServerFactory.getWebServer(ServletContextInitializer... initializers)
      Gets a new fully configured but paused WebServer instance.

      Utility method that can be used by subclasses wishing to combine the specified ServletContextInitializer parameters with those defined in this instance.
